Lined Paper

Home Categories Tags Site Archive About Staff

About

Lined Paper is a Jekyll blog theme made to look like college-ruled notebook paper. Created using the Jekyll docs step by step tutorial. Made by iangge for the purpose of learning front-end development concepts (HTML, CSS, Jekyll, and Figma).

  • Repo link: github.com/iangge/lined-paper

Inspired by

  • Chirpy - Jekyll Theme
  • Notes - Tumblr Theme

Avatar image in the top left was made in Maplestory Worlds.
